tool_description: an api retrieving the top questions from stack overflow from the home page categories, (bounty, interesting, week top), providing the question, number of answers and URL.
title: stack overflow monitor

api_list.name: Get top bounty questions on stack over flow
api_list.description: this return the top questions under the bounty tab of stack overlfow, displaying the question the URL and the rep that can be gained if answered.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stack-overflow-monitor.p.rapidapi.com/bountyhunter"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stack-overflow-monitor.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: get interesting questions
api_list.description: this end point return the top interesting questions on stack overflow
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stack-overflow-monitor.p.rapidapi.com/interesting"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stack-overflow-monitor.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
